text: What's the most embarrassing thing you've done in public?
Do your best impression of your favorite movie character.
What's your biggest fear that you've never told anyone?
Sing your favorite song as dramatically as possible.
What's the weirdest dream you can remember having?
Tell your partner three things you love most about them.
What was your first impression of your partner?
Give your partner a 2-minute shoulder massage.
What's your favorite memory of us together?
Write a short love note to your partner and read it aloud.
What's something you've always wanted to try but been too shy to ask?
Give your partner a sensual kiss on their neck.
What's your biggest romantic fantasy?
Blindfold your partner and feed them something sweet.
What's the most romantic thing someone could do for you?
Dance to an imaginary song for 30 seconds.
What's your most irrational phobia?
Try to lick your own elbow.
What song reminds you most of your partner?
Whisper something sweet and seductive in your partner's ear.
